referenceObject.reference: Kaya, R. S., Zamani, A., Yağmur, E. A. & Marusik, Y. M. (2023b). A new species of Anatextrix Kaya, Zamani, Yağmur & Marusik, 2023 (Araneae, Agelenidae, Textricini) from southern Türkiye, with a remarkable morphology of the male palpal femur. Zoosystematics and Evolution 99(2): 299-305.
